special1.description: The Cart Armory increases your every Cart's Health points by 50 and defense by 10.
The Cart Armory increases your every Cart's Health points by 25 and defense by 3.

special2.description:
The Nanomedic provides a Health regeneration bonus
(7 x level) to any creature in visiting hero's army until the end of this week.
special2.name: Nanomedic

rewards.message: A faint hum fills the air as the egg-shaped apparatus starts producing nanomachines. These small mechanical organism implanted into bodies of your troops will continue to restore both living tissue and mechanical parts, until they need to be recharged next week.

special3.description: Garrison's hero will gain +1 attack, defense, spell power and luck during a siege. Additionally they will cast spells with cost reduced by 1.
special3.name: Safeguard's Harness

grail.description: The presence of the Energy Coil increases weekly creature generation by 50%, provides your kingdom with an additional 5000 gold each day, and summons a bolt of energy to strike your enemies at the start of every battle. This spell will also appear in every hero's spellbook.
grail.name: Energy Coil
